segment.source: Pilot
segment.target: Pilot

segment.source: Pilot
segment.target: Pilot

segment.source: The pilot phase is an opportunity to test the technical implementation, communication plan, and training and support plans in a small production environment.
segment.target: The pilot phase is an opportunity to test the technical implementation, communication plan, and training and support plans in a small production environment.

segment.source: Why is this important?
segment.target: Why is this important?

segment.source: By doing a pilot, you'll surface any technical issues your users may encounter and have the opportunity to manage those things before rolling out to the organization as a whole.
segment.target: By doing a pilot, you'll surface any technical issues your users may encounter and have the opportunity to manage those things before rolling out to the organization as a whole.

segment.source: You'll also validate all aspects of the user experience and have the opportunity to make changes where needed to ensure a successful launch to your broader organization.
segment.target: You'll also validate all aspects of the user experience and have the opportunity to make changes where needed to ensure a successful launch to your broader organization.

segment.source: With careful planning and clear, concise success metrics, you'll prepare your project team and users for a positive experience and ongoing adoption.
segment.target: With careful planning and clear, concise success metrics, you'll prepare your project team and users for a positive experience and ongoing adoption.

segment.source: Begin by reviewing the discovery questions to the left, to help scope and define the pilot phase of your rollout
segment.target: Begin by reviewing the discovery questions to the left, to help scope and define the pilot phase of your rollout

segment.source: Discovery questions
segment.target: Discovery questions

segment.source: Discuss these questions with your project team to help scope your project details, uncover potential risks, and define actionable tasks which can be documented in the Rollout Planning Guide and Project Plan.
segment.target: Discuss these questions with your project team to help scope your project details, uncover potential risks, and define actionable tasks which can be documented in the Rollout Planning Guide and Project Plan.

segment.source: Besides the technical implementation, what else are you testing during this pilot phase?
segment.target: Besides the technical implementation, what else are you testing during this pilot phase?

segment.source: What are your goals to indicate a successful pilot?
segment.target: What are your goals to indicate a successful pilot?

segment.source: How will you measure success metrics?
segment.target: How will you measure success metrics?

segment.source: What is your pilot timeline and what are key milestones?
segment.target: What is your pilot timeline and what are key milestones?

segment.source: How will you prepare and provide support for pilot participants?
segment.target: How will you prepare and provide support for pilot participants?

segment.source: What is the end-user experience from pilot start to completion?
segment.target: What is the end-user experience from pilot start to completion?

segment.source: When will you know to move to the broad launch?
segment.target: When will you know to move to the broad launch?

segment.source: Focus area goals
segment.target: Focus area goals

segment.source: Review this section for guidance on focus-area activities for this stated phase of your rollout.
segment.target: Review this section for guidance on focus-area activities for this stated phase of your rollout.

segment.source: Planning
segment.target: Planning

segment.source: The key to a successful pilot is good planning including knowing what your success criteria are and how you'll be measuring those things.
segment.target: The key to a successful pilot is good planning including knowing what your success criteria are and how you'll be measuring those things.

segment.source: Having the right team to manage all aspects of the pilot is also very important and something to plan for early-on in the process to ensure resources are allocated and goals are in alignment.
segment.target: Having the right team to manage all aspects of the pilot is also very important and something to plan for early-on in the process to ensure resources are allocated and goals are in alignment.

segment.source: Rollout Planning Guide
segment.target: Rollout Planning Guide

segment.source: Project Plan
segment.target: Project Plan

segment.source: Deployment Readiness Report
segment.target: Deployment Readiness Report

segment.source: Pilot planning
segment.target: Pilot planning

segment.source: Goals and Metrics
segment.target: Goals and Metrics

segment.source: Help desk
segment.target: Help desk

segment.source: A support plan that includes proactive assistance can significantly improve user confidence which results in happy users and increased adoption.
segment.target: A support plan that includes proactive assistance can significantly improve user confidence which results in happy users and increased adoption.

segment.source: The help desk should be aware of the changes being made to your implementation, and potential issues that may arise, so that quick solutions can be found for individual issues.
segment.target: The help desk should be aware of the changes being made to your implementation, and potential issues that may arise, so that quick solutions can be found for individual issues.

segment.source: The help desk can also report back to the design team if the design approach is creating issues for all users.
segment.target: The help desk can also report back to the design team if the design approach is creating issues for all users.

segment.source: Awareness
segment.target: Awareness

segment.source: Pilot users need to understand the who, what, when, where, why of the project.
segment.target: Pilot users need to understand the who, what, when, where, why of the project.

segment.source: "How the pilot affects me" is the #1 question users will have.
segment.target: "How the pilot affects me" is the #1 question users will have.

segment.source: Putting yourself in the users' shoes and understanding that end-user experience from end-to-end will be important.
segment.target: Putting yourself in the users' shoes and understanding that end-user experience from end-to-end will be important.

segment.source: Awareness activities and communications to help users understand what their responsibilities are and how they will be supported during the pilot phase should be utilized.
segment.target: Awareness activities and communications to help users understand what their responsibilities are and how they will be supported during the pilot phase should be utilized.

segment.source: Training
segment.target: Training

segment.source: Providing a high-level of training for pilot users will help to form a well thought out training plan for the broad launch.
segment.target: Providing a high-level of training for pilot users will help to form a well thought out training plan for the broad launch.

segment.source: Use test plans and offer a variety of training options during the pilot.
segment.target: Use test plans and offer a variety of training options during the pilot.

segment.source: Learn what your users respond to and what changes might need to be made to existing materials to ensure users are prepared for the broad launch.
segment.target: Learn what your users respond to and what changes might need to be made to existing materials to ensure users are prepared for the broad launch.

segment.source: Operations
segment.target: Operations

segment.source: Operations is often overlooked in the pilot phase.
segment.target: Operations is often overlooked in the pilot phase.

segment.source: The pilot is the first opportunity for admins to adjust their procedures including: tuning alerts, validating operations procedures, validating daily management tasks around monitoring, users, and devices, and validating help desk escalation procedures.
segment.target: The pilot is the first opportunity for admins to adjust their procedures including: tuning alerts, validating operations procedures, validating daily management tasks around monitoring, users, and devices, and validating help desk escalation procedures.

segment.source: Get started checklist
segment.target: Get started checklist

segment.source: Here is a list of steps to get you started with the Pilot phase.
segment.target: Here is a list of steps to get you started with the Pilot phase.

segment.source: Document clearly articulated goals and success metrics and communicate within project team.
segment.target: Document clearly articulated goals and success metrics and communicate within project team.

segment.source: Assemble a rollout planning team comprised of coordinated work streams to focus on core technical, change management, end-user experience, and operational focus areas.
segment.target: Assemble a rollout planning team comprised of coordinated work streams to focus on core technical, change management, end-user experience, and operational focus areas.

segment.source: Communicate timelines, responsibilities, and pilot goals; introduce readiness report.
segment.target: Communicate timelines, responsibilities, and pilot goals; introduce readiness report.

segment.source: Conduct regular project meetings and communicate project status through an executive status report.
segment.target: Conduct regular project meetings and communicate project status through an executive status report.

segment.source: Identify users for inclusion in the pilot.
segment.target: Identify users for inclusion in the pilot.

segment.source: Identify any considerations/risks/mitigations that may impact the pilot.
segment.target: Identify any considerations/risks/mitigations that may impact the pilot.

segment.source: Define the support process for the pilot including a hyper-care period.
segment.target: Define the support process for the pilot including a hyper-care period.

segment.source: Define the pilot training plan including support representatives and pilot users; conduct training.
segment.target: Define the pilot training plan including support representatives and pilot users; conduct training.

segment.source: Define the pilot awareness and communications plan.
segment.target: Define the pilot awareness and communications plan.

segment.source: Develop and distribute end-user documentation.
segment.target: Develop and distribute end-user documentation.

segment.source: Customize feedback surveys & incorporate into communication plan.
segment.target: Customize feedback surveys & incorporate into communication plan.

segment.source: Hold a pilot kick-off event and other awareness activities.
segment.target: Hold a pilot kick-off event and other awareness activities.

segment.source: Common challenges
segment.target: Common challenges

segment.source: Here are some challenges that you may encounter in the Pilot phase.
segment.target: Here are some challenges that you may encounter in the Pilot phase.

segment.source: Challenge: The pilot is run with IT users and general business users who are not a true representation of the organization as a whole.
segment.target: Challenge: The pilot is run with IT users and general business users who are not a true representation of the organization as a whole.

segment.source: True validation, processes, and resources cannot occur.
segment.target: True validation, processes, and resources cannot occur.

segment.source: Mitigation: Include participants from across the organization with various roles within different groups with different levels of technical knowledge to understand what to expect for the broad rollout.
segment.target: Mitigation: Include participants from across the organization with various roles within different groups with different levels of technical knowledge to understand what to expect for the broad rollout.

segment.source: Challenge: Success criteria has not been established specifically for the pilot phase and no way to base a go/no-go decision to move onto a broad launch.
segment.target: Challenge: Success criteria has not been established specifically for the pilot phase and no way to base a go/no-go decision to move onto a broad launch.

segment.source: Mitigation: Define qualitative and quantitative success criteria specific to your organization so that a clear decision can be made based on facts to move to the next phase of deployment.
segment.target: Mitigation: Define qualitative and quantitative success criteria specific to your organization so that a clear decision can be made based on facts to move to the next phase of deployment.
